name: Cashmere
description:
Welcome to Yarn Mountain , a small mountain knitting community with lots a friendly sheep happy to share their knowledge with you .  You join Cashmere the Goat on his pursuit of knowledge about knitting colloquial terms . 

This game was born out of the concept of a playable glossary but I hope to develop it further to include other aspects of knitting and possibly introduce opportunities to craft in the game. 

This is an introductory version of the game to explore the concepts and mechanics so feedback is welcomed.
